definition: sudden, very great and often surprising
exciting and impressive
connected with the theatre or plays
exaggerated in order to create a special effect and attract people’s attention
having won a victory; that ends in victory
that wins or has won something, for example a race or competition
attractive in a way that makes other people like you
a series of victories or successes
very successful in a way that causes great pleasure
showing great pleasure or joy about a victory or success
done or made in order to celebrate a great success or victory
feeling or showing great happiness because of a success
the happy celebration of something
the supposed ability to recognize other people who are gay
having small raised red spots on the skin
connected with the scientific study of the development of language or of a particular language
showing a lack of care about danger and the possible results of your actions
an infection of the bladder, especially in women, that causes painful urination which happens often
infection of the urethra
a creature like a small, short worm that is the young form of a fly and is found in meat and other food that is going bad. Maggots are often used as bait to catch fish.
painful swelling (= the condition of being larger or rounder than normal) of the breast or udder usually because of infection
produced in reaction to something, without any serious thought
that you can keep permanently
having the right to keep their job permanently
the position of a caliph
an area of land that is ruled over by a caliph
weather conditions in which there is so much snow or cloud that it is impossible to see anything
a person who hijacks a plane or other vehicle
a man, usually on a horse and carrying a gun, who stole from travellers on public roads in the past
based on or containing facts
being the most basic meaning of a word or phrase, rather than an extended or poetic meaning
that follows the original words exactly
not having or showing any imagination
needing great effort and energy
determined and showing great energy
experience of the world and knowledge of fashion, culture and other things that people think are socially important
the quality in a machine or system of being clever and complicated in the way that it works or is presented
the ability to understand difficult or complicated ideas
the improvement of somebody’s mind or character
